emissions.closest_match_explanation: Matched '1 kg minced beef' to 'beef, mince, 5-10% fat, raw' as it is the closest match for minced beef and follows the rules for realistic comparisons and processing levels.
Matched '3 large onions' to 'onion, raw' as it is the least processed and a direct match for raw onions.
Matched '3 carrots' to 'carrot, raw' as it is the least processed option available for carrots.
Matched '2.5 stalks celery' to 'celery, raw' as it is the least processed option available for celery.
Matched '150 g tomato concentrate' to 'tomato paste, concentrated' as it is the closest match and involves similar processing.
Matched '3 tins chopped tomatoes' to 'tomato, peeled, canned' as it is the least processed option available for canned tomatoes.
Matched '2 dl red wine' to 'wine, red' as it is a direct match for red wine.
Matched '0.5 dl olive oil' to 'olive oil' as it is a direct match for olive oil.
Matched 'pasta as desired' to 'pasta, raw' as it is the least processed option available for pasta.
Matched 'grated parmesan' to 'cheese, hard, parmesan, 32 % fidm.' as it is the closest match for grated parmesan cheese.
